hero_section.description: Spread the Triv-link to your friends and relatives.Get commissions and free overseas holidays!

downline_section.title: Monitor Your Downline in Real-Time
downline_section.desc: Triv strives to make the management of your downline very transparent. You can find out the movement and commission earning instantly and in real-time.

withdraw_section.title: Withdraw Affiliate Commission 24/7
withdraw_section.desc: Disbursement of commission results can be done in real time and instant to 61 Banks and E-wallet

holiday_section.title: Get Free Overseas Holiday Gifts!
holiday_section.desc_1: Triv distributes free overseas gifts to Top Marketers every quarter. Enjoy free holidays to the best vacation destinations.
holiday_section.desc_2: * Prizes are given directly, without drawing and without any fees, Beware of fraud.
